`SparkLine` (component)
=======================



Props
-----

### `boundingClientRect` (required)

type: `object`


### `circleRadius`

type: `number`
defaultValue: `3`


### `className`

type: `string`
defaultValue: `'spark-lines'`


### `data` (required)

type: `arrayOf[object Object]`


### `margins`

type: `shape[object Object]`
defaultValue: `{
    top: 1,
    right: 1,
    bottom: 1,
    left: 1,
}`
